funkatronics.code.tactilewaves.com

Interface Bluetooth

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BluetoothAndroid, BluetoothJava

    public interface Bluetooth
    Interface that defines required Bluetooth functionality of implementing class

    Used to abstract away the different approaches for Bluetooth communication on Android and regular old Java.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int STATE_CONNECTED
      Bluetooth is currently connected to a device
      static int STATE_CONNECTING
      Bluetooth is currently connecting to a device
      static int STATE_DISCOVERY
      Bluetooth is currently discovering
      static int STATE_NONE
      Bluetooth is not available or not supported
      static int STATE_OK
      Bluetooth is supported, but not ready/available
      static int STATE_READY
      Bluetooth is ready to do Bluetooth stuff

      • setListener

        void setListener(BluetoothEventListener listener)

      • send

        void send(java.lang.String send)
   throws java.io.IOException
        Send a string of char's over BT
        Parameters:
        send - - String to send over BT
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an exception is thrown when attempting to write to the stream, or if Bluetooth is not enabled/available

   throws java.io.IOException
        Send an array of bytes over BT

        Throws:
